import React from 'react'; import { Search, Mail, Lock, Eye, EyeOff, User, Briefcase } from 'lucide-react'; import BaseRegister from './BaseRegister'; export default function VerifierRegister() { const [showPassword, setShowPassword] = React.useState(false); const [showConfirmPassword, setShowConfirmPassword] = React.useState(false); const initialFormData = { companyName: '', email: '', password: '', confirmPassword: '', contactPerson: '', phone: '', companyWebsite: '', position: '', agreeToTerms: false, role: 'recruiter' }; const handleSubmit = async (formData: typeof initialFormData) => { if (formData.password !== formData.confirmPassword) { return { success: false, message: 'Passwords do not match' }; } if (!formData.agreeToTerms) { return { success: false, message: 'Please agree to the terms and conditions' }; } // Here you would typically make an API call to register the verifier/recruiter return { success: true, message: 'Registration successful' }; }; return ( {({ formData, handleInputChange, isLoading }: { formData: any; handleInputChange: (e: React.ChangeEvent) => void; isLoading: boolean; }) => ( <>
